items.sentence: Tom and Mary traveled together around the world.
Tom walked home in the rain without an umbrella.
You should phone your mother as soon as you can.
To make matters worse, it began to rain heavily.
Tom was reading a book while listening to music.
A moose licked Tom's face while he was sleeping.
I really shouldn't have eaten so much ice cream.
I don't think the joke you told was appropriate.
That isn't the kind of thing that we like to do.
I didn't think something like this would happen.
If you don't mind, I'll eat one of these donuts.
Tom made several tries, but he failed each time.
Tom sat over there reading a book all afternoon.
The first time I met Tom, I thought he was rich.
In times like this, we should all pull together.
Pay attention to your surroundings at all times.
Stop borrowing my clothes without my permission.
There are a lot of mistakes in this translation.
Please wash your hands after using the bathroom.
The government doesn't invest much in education.
